snippet.title: GENETOS  Ver. 1.00 Trailer  ～７分で大体プレイした感じになるGENETOS～
snippet.description:
Hi. I'm Tatsuya Koyama, Japanese indie game developer. This is a introduction movie of my work GENETOS.

This game GENETOS is a vertical shooter with a "evolution" theme. In GENETOS, the stages mean different generations in the evolution of shmups.

The 1st level, you start out with a Space Invaders-like game.
In the 2nd level, you move into late-eighties-style world.
The 3rd level is more standard. You get bombs and more firepower.
And the 4th level, you can go to the bullet hell.
What do you see waiting for the Final Generation?

GENETOS is a freeware. You can download it from my website:
    http://www.tatsuya-koyama.com/software/wg002_genetos_eng.html

The full version of GENETOS is coming soon!


進化するシューティングゲーム「GENETOS」（ジェネトス）の紹介ムービーです。「入門しやすいシューティング」をコンセプトに、私こと小山達矢が独自に開発しています。

ゲームはインベーダーのようなシンプルなものから始まり、だんだんシステムやグラフィックスが複雑で現代的なものに世代を越えて進化していきます。

GENETOSは以下のページからダウンロードできますので、よろしかったら是非遊んでみてください。
　　　個人サイト「俺式」 ： http://www.tatsuya-koyama.com/oresiki.html
（※Ver. 1.00 は近日中に公開予定です）
___

Hi. I'm Tatsuya Koyama, Japanese indie game developer. This is a introduction movie of my work GENETOS.

This game GENETOS is a vertical shooter with a "evolution" theme. In GENETOS, the stages mean different generations in the evolution of shmups.

The 1st level, you start out with a Space Invaders-like game.
In the 2nd level, you move into late-eighties-style world.
The 3rd level is more standard. You get bombs and more firepower.
And the 4th level, you can go to the bullet hell.
What do you see waiting for the Final Generation?

GENETOS is a freeware. You can download it from my website:

The full version of GENETOS is coming soon!
